text:
Jiří Tomáš Kotalík (14 February 1951 – 2 July 2020) was a Czech art historian. He was born in Prague. From 1997 to 2003 and again from 2010 to 2014, he was the Rector of the Academy of Fine Arts, Prague. A professor, he also taught at the Film and TV School of the Academy of Performing Arts in Prague.
Kotalík died on 2 July 2020 in Prague, aged 69.

annotations.surface_form: Film and TV School of the Academy of Performing Arts in Prague
